location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 35/48 'Muscat: installation of automatic telephone system'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 40; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the installation of telephone equipment at Muscat by Cable and Wireless Limited.The file contains correspondence between: the Foreign Office; the India Office; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; Cable and Wireless Limited; the General Post Office; and Automatic Telephone & Electric Company Limited.
